author: Martin
text:
Good for selling but don't buy anything from StockX. Selling is easy albeit a high cost in seller fees you need to pay, unless you sell a lot.
I will give them kudos for making a good iPhone app to track items and also make it easy to place a bid or ask on items. It's usually easy to find what you are looking for.
When it comes to buying sneakers from StockX, I have had several issues over the years that were rarely rectified. They simply offer you $20 off your next buy to try rectify the situation. I have received damaged boxes, factory issues on sneakers, and even a fake pair of Yeezy QNTM sneakers with the fake receipt included in the box. People basically use StockX to dump grade B pairs of sneakers and they seem to pass.
Their support system is a joke. Each time you try to contact them in the app, it creates a new case. There's no way to track a case with them. I had situation recently where I spoke to someone via the chat in their iPhone app, with all the photos they needed and my information. Only to find out they never opened a case for me. If you have any issues (which you will) send them an email with all the details, if you want to get a response to an issue.
title: Good for selling but don't buy anything…

author: Corin Giff
text:
I bought a pair of Travis Scott Fragment Jordan 1s - they not only did not arrive but after trying to get it sorted for a month StockX have told me they're refusing to even investigate/talk to UPS about it. The tracking shows they're delivered in a separate part of the country to where they're meant to be, i received an email yesterday after having my emails ignored 5+ times informing me:

"I would love to do everything in my power to assist you. However, after further review, I found that our claims team denied your request for an investigation for this package."

NOT that they had concluded it was delivered or anything like that (the tracking on it shows delivered 3 hours away from me to a name nowhere close to on the order), that they wouldn't even investigate it.

This is actually illegal and i'm in the process of reporting them to Trading Standards in the UK, and i've sent an email which has again been ignored that if it isn't refunded in the next week i'll be charging back via bank.

I am surprised honestly that no one has brought them to court about something like this as not delivering and then refusing to investigate actually breaches the Consumer Rights Act of 2015 in the UK

"If you bought something from a business to be delivered, it’s the seller’s responsibility to make sure the item is delivered to you.

If the seller used a courier, they should chase the courier to find out what’s happened to your order - it’s not your responsibility." - Direct from Citizens Advice, a government ran legal advice site

I honestly suggest anyone that's looking to buy to look elsewhere - keep in mind StockX will actually break the law if they don't deliver your shoes just to keep your money.



EDIT: Hi StockX, I reported this the day after it was marked as delivered on UPS - your terrible support then did not respond until a week and a half later when I chatted with them
title: StockX will not refund you if they don't deliver your items

author: Bell
text:
Whenever an issue appears it is never resolved. Customer support is non existent. All they are clearly instructed to do is give out random general information and never actually bother to solve the problem, hoping their customer gives up or if they don’t they simply stop replying altogether. This issue has come up again and again. Since august I have been unable to place asks or bids. After contacting them again and again and getting the same irrelevant information, almost 3 weeks ago I tried pushing even harder. They kept saying absolutely nothing useful regarding my issue, were unable to collect any actual data from my account and understand what could be causing it but kept thanking me for bringing up the issue. Mind you, the soonest each heartless pointless reply to my emails was coming 3 days later. Finally, 7 days ago they just stopped replying. Simply stopped. Their last email was, please place another ask or bid (as if I wasn’t already daily) so we can investigate, I instantly replied and haven’t heard from them since. The cases of people having issues with this platform is significantly higher than any other theoretically legitimate business. Find different ways to sell your products. STAY AWAY

Update: They we’re pretty quick to reply here. They really wanted the issue resolved. They asked for my info and I gave it to them. 4 more days passed and I finally got a reply. They reply was:

Thank you for reaching out about your concern, I am not seeing any restrictions on our end prohibiting you from buying or selling on our platform. Has this been resolved, if not can you please attach a screenshot of the error that you are receiving?

After 20 days, this. After tons of screenshots, this. After days of explaining, this. After so much money lost, this.
A person getting payed to take a 20second look at something and not even bother to look for the template. 2 lines of nothing, thanking me once again for my concern. Who knows maybe in 20 more days someone will ask again if it was solved by itself or maybe, at some point is will get resolved by itself. 

So, their practice is, as far as their customer support is concerned. One week goes by, you get a new agent that doesn’t read the previous communication and you start all over again. Till you give up, cos they won’t lose.
title: STAY AWAY! NO SAFETY! THEY MESS UP, YOU GET SCAMMED
